title: [Feature Request]: Design and implement progress messages API
body:
### Summary

Design and implement a new API for progress reporting for Tasks. 
Consume and show progress messages in new Terminal Logger.

### Background and Motivation

Many messages that are logged by the tasks are ephemeral and reporting the progress of the task. It would be beneficial to create an API to distinguish such messages and be able to process them in the loggers, especially Terminal Logger. After implementing we shall work with other teams to migrate usage of `message-as-progress-reporting` to the new progress message API.
